name: Sky Bright
about: Sky Bright, located at the Laconia Municipal Airport in Gilford, New Hampshire, is a renowned full-service Fixed Base Operator (FBO) and flight school. With over 35 years of experience, Sky Bright specializes in meeting all your aviation needs, including Phillips 66 aviation fuels, hangar services, and a pilot lounge. Our highly skilled flight instructors provide personalized and professional flight training, catering to both recreational and career-oriented pilots. We pride ourselves on maintaining the highest standards in customer service and safety, ensuring every student and visitor has an enjoyable and memorable experience in the beautiful Lakes Region of Central New Hampshire. Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction makes Sky Bright an ideal choice for all your aviation training and service needs.
